items.question: How much can I earn as a Dogplay Agent?
items.answer: Earnings depend on your traffic quality and volume. Our top partners earn over ₹10 lakhs monthly. We offer up to 50% RevShare or competitive CPA rates starting at $50 per player.

items.question: What payment methods do you support?
items.answer: We support USDT (TRC-20), Bitcoin, and direct bank transfers for Indian partners. Payments are processed weekly with no minimum threshold.

items.question: Is the Dogplay affiliate program available in India?
items.answer: Yes! Dogplay specifically welcomes Indian affiliates. We provide Hindi marketing materials and have dedicated support for the Indian market.

items.question: How do I track my referrals and earnings?
items.answer: Our real-time dashboard shows all clicks, registrations, deposits, and earnings. You can access detailed reports 24/7.

items.question: Do I need a website to become an affiliate?
items.answer: While having a website helps, it's not required. Many successful affiliates use social media, YouTube, or Telegram channels to promote.

items.question: How long does the cookie last?
items.answer: Our tracking cookie lasts 30 days, meaning you earn commissions on any signup within 30 days of a user clicking your link.

about.title: About Dogplay Agent
about.content: Dogplay Agent is the official affiliate program for Dogplay, one of Asia's leading online gaming platforms.

affiliateDisclosure.title: Affiliate Disclosure
affiliateDisclosure.content: This website is operated by independent affiliates of Dogplay. We may earn commissions when you click our links and make purchases or sign up for services. This comes at no additional cost to you.

responsibleGambling.title: Responsible Gambling
responsibleGambling.warning: Gambling should be entertaining, not a way to make money. Only gamble with money you can afford to lose.
responsibleGambling.ageRestriction: You must be 18 years or older to participate in gambling activities.
responsibleGambling.helplines: If you or someone you know has a gambling problem, please seek help.
